message.cooldown: Command is on cooldown, please wait for {{SKNDS}}
message.maintenance: The command is under maintenance, you can't use it at the moment
message.ownerOnly: Commands can only be used by the bot owner, you cannot use them
message.premiumOnly: Commands can only be used by premium users, you cannot use them
message.privateOnly: Commands can only be used in private chats, you cannot use them in group chats
message.groupOnly: Commands can only be used in group chats, you cannot use them in private chats
message.botGroupAdmin: The command can only be used if the bot is an admin of the group
message.ownerGroup: Commands can only be used by the group owner, you cannot use them
message.adminGroup: Commands can only be used by group admins, you cannot use them
